snippet: Lake Havasu City, Ariz., commemorates the 40th anniversary of the reconstruction of the London Bridge there with a celebration that harks back to a gorier era.
lead_paragraph: Lake Havasu City, Ariz., commemorates the 40th anniversary of the reconstruction of the London Bridge there with a celebration that harks back to a gorier era.

headline.main: A Red-Letter Day, and a Party to Match
headline.print_headline: A Red-Letter Day, And a Party to Match
headline.seo: London Bridge to Get a Gory Celebration in Arizona
